attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1) He is not a terrorist. He is a computer Nerd.

2) He has informed the USA of the weakness of there IT systems. Send him a medal - not to jail.

3) Why is the epetition name GARYMCKINNON already taken but when you search, it comes back with ZERO ?

4) We should ONLY have introduction such laws have the same equality

4) If someone from his bedroom can inflict this much damage to the USA system a) Would the USA have bben better keeping this very quite and b) Should he not have a job at GCHQ

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
